block.witchery.exposed_copper_witches_ov: Exposed Copper Witches Oven Fume Extension

book.witchery.guidebook.brazier.name: Brazier
book.witchery.guidebook.brewing.beginnin: For when you want more effects
book.witchery.guidebook.brewing.brew_of_: Erase the mind and soul alike.
Tear your soul from its mortal shell.
Liquid spider at your own disposal.
book.witchery.guidebook.brewing.hags_rin: First we mine... a bit further away
book.witchery.guidebook.brewing.name: Brewing
book.witchery.guidebook.brewing.necroman: A potent essence of trapped souls.
book.witchery.guidebook.brewing.potion_e: Slurp it throw it bathe it
book.witchery.guidebook.general.name: General
book.witchery.guidebook.general.owl.name: Owl
book.witchery.guidebook.lycanthropy.name: Lycanthropy
book.witchery.guidebook.potions.name: Potions
book.witchery.guidebook.ritual.bestial_c: The smell alone should call them...
book.witchery.guidebook.ritual.curse_of_: Bring bad luck to your target
Make your target burn in hot climates
Make your target sink in water
book.witchery.guidebook.ritual.fragility: Make your target vulnerable to harm
book.witchery.guidebook.ritual.name: Rituals
book.witchery.guidebook.ritual.necro_sto: One step closer to the grave
book.witchery.guidebook.ritual.soul_seve: Split the soul from its flesh from humanoids or humans.
book.witchery.guidebook.soul_magic.lifeb: There is an echo of something hallow...
book.witchery.guidebook.soul_magic.name: Soul Magic
book.witchery.guidebook.tarot.death.name: Death
book.witchery.guidebook.tarot.name: Tarot
book.witchery.guidebook.tarot.tarot_read: Divine your fortune with the cards
book.witchery.guidebook.vampirism.name: Vampirism
brazier.brazier.page.1: A Witches tool to burn ingredients with flint and steel, or a fire charge.
brazier.censer.page.1: The Censer burns potions as incense, spreading their effects to all nearby. Right-click with any potion to add it to the censer. Effects continuously apply within a 16-block radius while the potion lasts.
brazier.censer.page.2:
\
\
Certain ingredients burn eternally when blessed by altar power. Soul fire particles indicate an active censer, with colored wisps showing the potion's nature.
brazier.potion.page.1: Burning potions with wooden ash is an easy way to make the effect linger. Not as portable as a Lingering potion, but far easier to get.
brazier.soul_cage.page.1: The Brazier provides an excellent way to contain souls and spirits. To aid us in the collection we can convert it to a Soul Cage. Use a regular glass block on the brazier to convert it. With this, use a Spectral Dust to create a barrier around this for a minute.
brazier.summon.page.1: Burning a set of specific ingredients, we can call the dead to later bind to an effigy for unique, and maybe deadly, effects.
brewing.beginning_potions.page.1: Custom potions are made in a lit Cauldron access to an Altar with sufficient power depending on the resources used. The first ingredient must be a Nether Wart. Other than Altar Power, Potions require Capacity to increase the amount of ingredients the potion can hold.
brewing.beginning_potions_2.page.2: Stronger ingredients require more altar power to successfully mix.
brewing.brew_of_erosion.page.1: A draught that unravels stone and soil alike. Watch the land decay—grass to dirt, stone to rubble—until only ruin remains.
brewing.brew_of_flowing_spirit.page.1: Can only be made in the Spirit World. Throw to make a fluid which applies regeneration to anyone bathing in it. Throw it on double doors in the Spirit World to make a Spirit Portal. Rite of Manifestation required to enter it
brewing.brew_of_frost.page.1: Freezes water and makes entities chilly
brewing.brew_of_love.page.1: Makes Animals go into spontaneous labour
brewing.brew_of_oblivion.page.1: A draught that devours memory itself. Those touched by it forget all bonds, duties, and grudges—left hollow, wandering in mental fog. Even the wisest will find their minds unmade.
brewing.brew_of_raising.page.1: Raises one dead from the dirt
brewing.brew_of_revealing.page.1: Used to remove Invisibility effects on entities. Makes Spectral Creatures easier to see.
brewing.brew_of_sleeping.page.1: Enter the Spirit world in your dreams, beware of your surroundings and to avoid a nightmare, use dream weavers, wispy cotton and flowing spirit nearby.
brewing.brew_of_soul_severance.page.1: Sever the tie between soul and flesh. Wander as spirit, or take the dead as hosts. Return soon, lest your body rot.
brewing.brew_of_the_grotesque.page.1: A twisted brew that warps the drinker’s face into a demonic visage. Villagers flee in terror at the sight.
brewing.brews.page.1: Brews are the primary creations of the cauldron. These magical mixtures can be consumed or thrown, granting various effects to those who use them. Master these recipes to harness their power.
brewing.cauldron.page.1: A vessel most vital for the crafting of Brews, Potions, and Witching Wares. Must be filled with Water and set o’er Flame. Oft’ it doth require an Altar nearby. A pinch of Wood Ash shall cleanse its humours. Should thy brew turn brown, beware—'tis likely spoiled, lest the hue be true to thine ingredients.
brewing.flying_ointment.page.1: An oil of wind and wings. Imbue your broom and soar high.
brewing.ghost_of_the_light.page.1: A pale brew born of spirits lost to the light. Stir it well, for it whispers secrets from the shadows.
brewing.hags_ring_infusion_lumber.page.1: In an already finished Brew of Wasting. Toss a Hag's Ring: Reacher and infuse the properties of the brew into the ring. Equip it and with a Witch's hand, use it to harvest multiple logs at once
brewing.hags_ring_infusion_miner.page.1: In an already finished Brew of Erosion. Toss a Hag's Ring: Reacher and infuse the properties of the brew into the ring. Equip it and with a Witch's hand, use it to harvest multiple ores at once
brewing.hags_ring_infusion_reach.page.1: In an already finished Brew of Webs. Toss a Golden Ring and infuse the properties of the brew into the ring. Equip it and gain more reach.
brewing.infusions.page.1: Infusions are concentrated magical essences that serve as components for more advanced rituals and crafting. Unlike brews, they are not meant to be consumed but used as ingredients.
brewing.necromantic_soulbind.page.1: Use in dark rituals to bind or manipulate spirits.
brewing.potion_capacity.page.1: After the Nether Wart has been added the potion starts without any capacity. And since most ingredients cost capacity, capacity modifiers should be added first, but not limited to first. Potent ingredients might require more than one capacity.
brewing.potion_capacity.title: Brew Capacity
brewing.potion_effect.page.1: Effects usually costs Capacity, noted on top right of the item.Most potions needs to be thrown. As long a potion has capacity it hang hold any amount of effects.
brewing.ritual_chalk.page.1: The standard ritual chalk, no special alignment.
brewing.spirit_of_otherwhere.page.1: A strange concoction that binds the essence of those who roam beyond. Drink deep, and feel the weight of distant worlds.
death.attack.inSun: Turned to ash but the sun
general.beginning.page.1: All witchery begins with the green. Break thee the wild grass, and the earth shall gift thee seeds most curious and rare.
general.breath_of_the_goddess.page.1: A sacred fume drawn from the boughs of the Birch or Cherry, when touched by fire most gentle. 'Tis said the very breath of the Goddess herself lingers in its vapour.
general.cauldron.page.1: A vessel most vital for the crafting of Brews, Potions, and Witching Wares. Must be filled with Water and set Aflame. Often require an Altar nearby. A pinch of Wood Ash will cleanse its humours.
general.critter_snare.page.1:
Small Slimes, Bats and Silverfish will be trapped in this plant.
\
\
Require four Alder Saplings, Water, Cobweb and a Zombie.
general.distillery.page.1: Herein lies the art of separation. By fire’s kiss and alchemical glass, one may draw forth the true soul of a mixture, layer by layer.
general.exhale_of_the_horned_one.page.1: This fume is born of the wild woods, where the Horned Lord treads. Burn the wood of oak or dark oak, and if the night be right, the smoke shall bear his mark.
general.fume_expansion.page.1: With a maximum of two, one on each side of the Oven, this will increase the output chance of Fumes
general.grassper.page.1:
Can be used to hold items for rituals.
\
\
Require four grass, one chest and one water.
general.hint_of_rebirth.page.1: The faintest whisper of life renewed. Found only in the last breath of dying spruce or the smoulder of young jungle green.
general.mushroom_log.page.1: With a Moss block, two dark oak logs placed on the ground and a mushroom in your off-hand, create a way to easily farm any mushroom!
general.mutandis.page.1: Evil Scrambled Eggs. Used on Plants to mutate them into other plants, the mutations will be locked to the same type of plant for a few seconds on use, so for example saplings will turn into other saplings if used continually on the same sapling.
general.mutating_spring.page.1: Can create Grasspers, Critter Snares, Wormwood, Parasytioc Lose and Owls. And convert some blocks into other.
general.oven.page.1: By fire and fume, the Oven doth turn Saplings to Essences. With Jars in place, the Spirits are caught, else they vanish into the aether.
general.owl.page.1:
Familiar, quite stupid but grants better control over broom when bound.
\
\
Require three Mutandis Extremis, one Charges Attuned Stone, Water, Wolf, Cobweb and one Critter snare with a bat for each Owl.
general.parasitic_louse.page.1:
Can be picked up, has the ability to store and apply a Potion. Use potion on louse to apply it. has a chance to consume the potion on attacking a creature.
\
\
Require Two Mutandis, One Tongue of Dog, one Charged Attuned Stone and one Critter Snare with a Silverfish. Water and Lily pads.
general.poppet.page.1: Craft together with a Taglock to bind to a player or creature. If the poppet dont require to be in the owners inventory you can place it in the world.
general.tag_lock.page.1: To create a taglock, use a Bone Needle on a living target while holding a glass bottle in your offhand. This captures their essence into the bottle, creating a taglock you can use in rituals. Also used beds works for collection.
general.tag_lock.page.2: Taglocks expire after 2 days. Using the Bone Needle behind a player or while invisible increases your chance of success. Direct attempts in plain sight or in bright light are much less likely to succeed.
general.tear_of_the_goddess.page.1: Distilled sorrow and soft mercy. The Tear is not wept in vain, but drawn from sacred blooms under moonlight, when the air is thick with longing.
general.wormwood.page.1:
Used mostly in necromancy and brazier.
\
\
Require Wheat, four Wispy Cotton and Four Water.
item.witchery.exposed_copper_witches_ove: Exposed Copper Witches Oven Fume Extension
item.witchery.lifeblood_berry.tooltip: Fills the soul with ethereal vitality
item.witchery.oxidized_copper_witches_ov: Oxidized Copper Witches Oven Fume Extension
item.witchery.tarot_deck.desc: Fortune of three cards last 3 days
item.witchery.waxed_copper_witches_oven_: Waxed Copper Witches Oven Fume Extension
item.witchery.waxed_exposed_copper_witch: Waxed Exposed Copper Witches Oven Fume Extension
item.witchery.waxed_oxidized_copper_witc: Waxed Oxidized Copper Witches Oven Fume Extension
item.witchery.waxed_weathered_copper_wit: Waxed Weathered Copper Witches Oven Fume Extension
item.witchery.weathered_copper_witches_o: Weathered Copper Witches Oven Fume Extension
lycanthropy.were_1.page.1: The Wolf Altar recognizes those who seek the beast within. Offer three gold ingots to prove your worth to the pack. The altar will grant you a Moon Charm, marking you as one touched by lunar power.
lycanthropy.were_2.page.1: The hunger of the wolf must be sated. In your wolf form, hunt and kill thirty sheep. Their meat will transform into Raw Lambchops. Return these to the Wolf Altar as proof of your first successful hunt.
lycanthropy.were_3.page.1: The pack demands greater tribute. Collect ten Tongues of Dog from fallen wolves and offer them at the Wolf Altar. This sacrifice proves your dominance over lesser canines.
lycanthropy.were_4.page.1: The Horned Huntsman guards the ancient ways of the hunt. Face him in combat and claim victory. His defeat marks you as a true predator worthy of greater power.
lycanthropy.were_5.page.1: Perfect your killing instinct. Strike down ten hostile creatures with critical hits, showing mastery over the art of the lethal strike. Each kill must be precise and devastating.
lycanthropy.were_6.page.1: Mark your territory across the land. Travel to sixteen different locations and howl to claim them as your domain. Let all creatures know that a true wolf roams these lands.
lycanthropy.were_7.page.1: Build your pack through dominance and submission. In wolf form, tame six wild wolves using only your presence and empty hands. They will recognize the alpha within you.
lycanthropy.were_8.page.1: The Nether calls for blood. Hunt and kill thirty Zombie Pigmen in the burning realm. Prove that even in hell itself, the wolf is apex predator.
lycanthropy.were_9.page.1: The final transformation demands the ultimate choice. Spill the blood of a friend or an innocent villager. Only through this act can you fully embrace the beast and abandon your humanity.
potion_effect.blaze_powder: Brings strength like fire, fierce and fleeting.
potion_effect.ent_twig: Grows a tree. Can pick sapling from inventory
potion_effect.fermented_spider_eye: Good to bad and bad to good
potion_effect.fermented_spider_eye.title: Inverse Effect
potion_effect.glistering_melon_slice: Restores the flesh with golden sweetness.
potion_effect.lifeblood_berry: Extra hearts which regenerates over time
potion_effect.spectral_dust: Detaches the soul from the entity
potion_effect.spider_eye: A cursed touch, brings poison with a glance.
potion_effect.wheat_seeds: Plants seed items on the ground on tilled land
ritual.apply_ointment.page.1: Infuse the Broom with flying powers
ritual.befuddlement.page.1: This curse clouds the mind of your victim, causing confusion and nausea. Their movements become erratic and unpredictable as the curse disrupts their thoughts.
ritual.bestial_call.page.1: Will summon a flock of exactly 10 random animals, with some exceptions.
ritual.bind_familiar.page.1: Cats, Owls and Frogs. All with unique powers while bound. Cats amplify rites and curses. Owls increases Broom manoeuvrability. Frogs increase chance of extra brewed potions.
ritual.bind_spectral_creatures.page.1: Binds spectral creatures like Spirit, Banshee, Spectre and Poltergeist to an Effigy, like a Scarecrow, Trent Effigy or Witch's Ladder.
ritual.binding.page.1: Invisible box of immaculate force.. and in darkness bind them or something.
ritual.blocks_below_copper.page.1: Will pull copper from the depths below, this will consume the copper below in a cylinder of the ritual circle.
ritual.blocks_below_gold.page.1: Will pull gold from the depths below, this will consume the gold below in a cylinder of the ritual circle.
ritual.blocks_below_iron.page.1: Will pull iron from the depths below, this will consume the iron below in a cylinder of the ritual circle.
ritual.charge_attuned.page.1: Charges an attuned stone, this charge is required by some recipes and rituals, can also replace Altar Power up to 3000.
ritual.curse_of_corrupt_poppet.page.1: A sinister curse that corrupts the protective poppets of your victim, turning their safeguards into sources of harm. Requires a familiar cat to channel the dark magic.
ritual.curse_of_insanity.page.1: This terrible curse summons manifestations of madness to haunt your victim. Entities born of insanity will periodically appear to torment them. Requires stormy weather to cast.
ritual.curse_of_misfortune.page.1: Bad luck follows those afflicted by this curse. They will be randomly struck by debilitating effects, making even simple tasks difficult. Cast during a storm for maximum potency.
ritual.curse_of_overheating.page.1: Those cursed with overheating will burst into flames when in hot biomes. The scorching heat of deserts, savannas, and the Nether becomes unbearable, igniting their very flesh.
ritual.curse_of_sinking.page.1: Water becomes deadly for those afflicted with this curse. They will sink like stone, unable to swim to the surface. Best cast during a storm when the waters are already treacherous.
ritual.curses.page.1: Smite your enemies with curses, or they will curse you.
ritual.fragility.page.1: This curse weakens the body of your victim, making them brittle as glass. They will take significantly more damage from all sources.
ritual.golden_chalk.page.1: The center block in a ritual circle, surround with items either on ground or on a Grassper. Rightclick to activate the ritual
ritual.hunger.page.1: A cruel curse that inflicts insatiable hunger upon your target. No matter how much they eat, they will never feel satisfied as their food depletes rapidly.
ritual.infernal_chalk.page.1: Infernal Chalk channels the power of the underworld.
ritual.infuse_light.page.1: User can become invisible with a Witches Hand.
ritual.infuse_necromancy.page.1: Users can raise the souls of the slayed with the Witches Hand
ritual.infuse_otherwhere.page.1: User can teleport with a Witches Hand.
ritual.manifestation.page.1: Enables a player to walk through a spirit portal
ritual.otherwhere_chalk.page.1: Imbued with the essence of distant realms.
ritual.push_mobs.page.1: Mobs will be pushed away from the ritual center
ritual.raining_toad.page.1: It will rain and it will frog, watch out for their poisonous skin, will only last for a minute or two.
ritual.rite_of_charging_infusion.page.1: Replenishes the infused players power during the duration of the rite.
ritual.ritual_chalk.infernal_chalk.title: Infernal Chalk
ritual.ritual_chalk.page.1: The standard ritual chalk, no special alignment.
ritual.set_midnight.page.1: Manipulate the celestial bodies to make day into night.
ritual.soul_severance.page.1: The taglocked will be separated from its body. Only humans can reenter their bodies. Humanoids are left to wither unless they are collected with a Soul Cage. The soul cage are only able to sustain pure souls of villagers.
ritual.soulbind.page.1: Return to flesh if you ever find yourself without one.
ritual.stone_ritual.page.1: Every mob in the area will be petrified
ritual.summon_demon.page.1: Summons a fierce Demon which will drop a Demon Heart, an incredibly valuable resource
ritual.summon_imp.page.1: Trade souls for goods, souls in any form have to be close by for trading. Different souls have different value.
ritual.summon_spectral_pig.page.1: Summons a Spectral Pig which will drop Spectral Dust, a valuable resource
ritual.summon_wither.page.1: Its the wither what can i say
ritual.teleport_owner_to_waystone.page.1: Sends the user to the location of the waystone
ritual.waking_nightmare.page.1: A curse that traps the victim in an endless waking nightmare. Sleep becomes impossible as phantom terrors haunt them. Must be cast during the night when nightmares are strongest.
soul_magic.carving_1.page.1:
\
\
...weathered stone, older than memory, speaks of the first necromancer...
\
\
\
\
...the soul cage, a prison of iron and bone, holds the essence of the departed...
soul_magic.carving_1.page.2:
\
...a single undead villager's spirit, torn from flesh and bound in ethereal chains...
\
\
\
...the dead serve the living, shambling guardians that know not rest...
\
\
...command them to strike down the living, prove dominion over death...
soul_magic.carving_1.page.3:
\
...the protectors of the living, those of golem, must fall...
\
\
...five must be destroyed by necrotic hands...
\
\
\
...then three souls together, bound as one within the cage's embrace...
soul_magic.carving_1.title: TABLET DONT SPAWN NATURALLY YET
soul_magic.carving_2.page.1:
\
...the stone depicts a figure standing over fallen beasts...
\
\
...five creatures of innocence, their life force drained to emptiness...
\
\
...souls of the still living...work if slayed cold...
\
...sustenance not of flesh but of spirit...
soul_magic.carving_2.page.2:
\
...the greatest power lies in abandoning one's own flesh...
\
\
...spirit walks free, entering the hollow shell of the risen dead...
\
\
\
...wearing death's form, strike down the living, a villager's blood on possessed hands...
soul_magic.carving_2.page.3:
\
...the three-souled horror, born of nether stars...
\
\
\
...it too must fall before the master of death...
\
\
...only then does the final secret reveal itself...
soul_magic.carving_2.title: The Severed Soul
soul_magic.carving_3.page.1:
\
...the final carving shows a crystalline vessel, pulsing with unlife...
\
\
\
...bind your essence within, let death claim your body...
\
\
...the phylactery remembers, pulls you back from oblivion...
soul_magic.carving_3.page.2:
\
...but true lichdom demands the ultimate sacrifice...
\
\
...three times must you die, three times return...
\
\
\
...each death within the span of a single night...
soul_magic.carving_3.page.3:
\
...only then does mortality truly break...
\
\
\
...the phylactery holds three souls in reserve...
\
\
...death becomes but an inconvenience, the lich eternal...
soul_magic.carving_3.title: The Phylactery's Embrace
soul_magic.lifeblood.page.1:
Combine four Chorus, four Vines of Glowing Berries, and the soul of a Villager to build the contraption. Then, use a Mutating Spring on the cobweb at its center.
\
Consumed Lifeblood will regenerate health as long as there are some left to generate from.
soul_magic.soul_severance.page.1: Strip those lovely souls from their useless flesh. Most soul magic probably requires a pure villagers soul, or a zombie villager soul.
spirit_world.brew_of_flowing_spirit.page: Can only be made in the Spirit World. Throw to make a fluid which applies regeneration to anyone bathing in it. Throw it on double doors in the Spirit World to make a Spirit Portal. Rite of Manifestation required to enter it
spirit_world.disturbed_cotton.page.1: This nightmare warps and twists the Wispy Cotton to become... Disturbed..
spirit_world.dream_weaver_of_fasting.pag: A strange brew for the soul, fasting in sleep will still the hunger within, leaving you calm when the dawn breaks
Swift as the wind, this spirit will carry you swiftly through the waking world, like a whisper in the breeze.
spirit_world.dream_weaver_of_iron_arm.pa: The iron arm of slumber. Rest as if your body were bound by steel, and awaken with unyielding strength.
Born of shadow and fear, this weaver binds nightmares into the night. May it grant you peace when the dark calls.
spirit_world.hunger.page.1: Kill your Nightmare to acquire, can be brought between dream and reality.
spirit_world.wispy_cotton.page.1: A delicate weave from the fabric of dreams. To hold it is to hold the softness of slumber itself
tarot.death.reversed.text: Decay consumes you. Hunger drains constantly (0.5 exhaustion every 10 seconds). At nightfall, 15% chance Death itself manifests to claim your soul. This card expires upon summoning.
tarot.death.reversed.title: Death - Reversed
tarot.death.upright.text: Transformation through endings. Kills on summonable creatures have 5% chance to raise them as 24-hour ethereal servants. Each dawn purges all negative effects. Death renews.
tarot.death.upright.title: Death - Upright
tarot.judgement.reversed.text: Past sins haunt relentlessly. Each kill inflicts 2 hearts of magical damage upon yourself. Blood guilt weighs heavy on the damned.
tarot.judgement.reversed.title: Judgement - Reversed
tarot.judgement.upright.text: Rise from the ashes. When lethal damage strikes, 50% chance Judgement spares you at 1 health with Regeneration III, Fire Resistance, and Resistance II for 10 seconds. Kills restore 1 heart. Divine mercy is finite—this card expires after saving you.
tarot.judgement.upright.title: Judgement - Upright
tarot.justice.reversed.text: Injustice prevails cruelly. All damage you receive increases by 30% as the scales tip against you. Punishment comes swiftly and without mercy.
tarot.justice.reversed.title: Justice - Reversed
tarot.justice.upright.text: Perfect balance is maintained. When creatures damage you after you've struck them, they suffer 2 hearts of thorns damage. An eye for an eye brings karmic justice.
tarot.justice.upright.title: Justice - Upright
tarot.strength.reversed.text: Weakness pervades your limbs completely. Attack damage decreases by 1 heart as your power fades. The strong become feeble and powerless.
tarot.strength.reversed.title: Strength - Reversed
tarot.strength.upright.text: Devastating might flows through you. Attack damage increases by 3 hearts, and each kill restores 2 hearts of health. True strength encompasses both body and spirit.
tarot.strength.upright.title: Strength - Upright
tarot.tarot_reading.page.1: Right-click a Tarot Deck to perform a reading. Three cards will be drawn, revealing your fortune for the next three days. Each card brings powerful effects—both beneficial and perilous. A Crystal Ball reduces the chance of reversed cards appearing. Hold L.Alt to show active cards
tarot.temperance.reversed.text: Excess and imbalance plague all actions. Effects feel unstable and unpredictable (not yet implemented). Moderation utterly fails.
tarot.temperance.reversed.title: Temperance - Reversed
tarot.temperance.upright.text: Perfect balance restores harmony. When below half health, you slowly regenerate 0.5 hearts every 2 seconds. Water grants Water Breathing. Brews last longer (not yet implemented). Moderation brings peace.
tarot.temperance.upright.title: Temperance - Upright
tarot.the_chariot.reversed.text: Your path is blocked at every turn. Movement speed decreases by 5% as if wading through deep mud. Each step becomes laborious torment.
tarot.the_chariot.reversed.title: The Chariot - Reversed
tarot.the_chariot.upright.text: Swift as the wind, unstoppable as a charging steed. Your movement speed increases by 10%, granting you the mobility to chase victory.
tarot.the_chariot.upright.title: The Chariot - Upright
tarot.the_devil.reversed.text: Breaking free from bondage. Every 30 seconds, all negative effects are cleansed, but you lose 5 experience levels with each purge. Freedom costs dearly.
tarot.the_devil.reversed.title: The Devil - Reversed
tarot.the_devil.upright.text: Dark power demands sacrifice. Attack damage increases by 2 hearts, but max health decreases by 1 heart. Devastating strength comes at the cost of vitality.
tarot.the_devil.upright.title: The Devil - Upright
tarot.the_emperor.reversed.text: Authority crumbles to dust. Each dawn strips away 10 experience levels as your power diminishes. Control slips through your fingers like sand.
tarot.the_emperor.reversed.title: The Emperor - Reversed
tarot.the_emperor.upright.text: Command and dominance flow through you. Each dawn grants 10 minutes of Resistance, and your strikes have a 15% chance to inflict Slowness II on enemies for 5 seconds.
tarot.the_emperor.upright.title: The Emperor - Upright
tarot.the_empress.reversed.text: The harvest fails utterly. Breaking crops has a 30% chance to destroy them entirely, yielding nothing. Nature withholds its gifts from unworthy hands.
tarot.the_empress.reversed.title: The Empress - Reversed
tarot.the_empress.upright.text: Nature's bounty flows freely. Breaking crops has a 25% chance to yield extra drops, and each dawn restores 4 hunger points. The earth provides generously to those who nurture it.
tarot.the_empress.upright.title: The Empress - Upright
tarot.the_fool.reversed.text: Recklessness brings misfortune. You occasionally stumble on nothing, taking fall damage while grounded. All damage received increases by 20%. Each step risks painful consequence.
tarot.the_fool.reversed.title: The Fool - Reversed
tarot.the_fool.upright.text: Fortune favors the bold. Random beneficial effects occasionally bless you (speed, jump, or luck), and all damage taken is reduced by 10%. Embrace new adventures without fear.
tarot.the_fool.upright.title: The Fool - Upright
tarot.the_hanged_man.reversed.text: You cannot let go of anything. Items refuse to leave your grasp—dropping and throwing becomes impossible. Complete attachment binds you.
tarot.the_hanged_man.reversed.title: The Hanged Man - Reversed
tarot.the_hanged_man.upright.text: Sacrifice brings purpose. Your fall speed decreases by 30% as you drift gently downward. Taking over 5 hearts of damage channels 100 altar power per heart to the nearest altar within 16 blocks.
tarot.the_hanged_man.upright.title: The Hanged Man - Upright
tarot.the_hermit.reversed.text: Loneliness becomes madness. When no other players are within 32 blocks, you lose 2 hearts of max health. Isolation drains your life force completely.
tarot.the_hermit.reversed.title: The Hermit - Reversed
tarot.the_hermit.upright.text: Wisdom blooms in isolation. When no other players are within 32 blocks, you gain 1 experience every 5 seconds as you contemplate existence's mysteries.
tarot.the_hermit.upright.title: The Hermit - Upright
tarot.the_hierophant.reversed.text: Healing forsakes the unfaithful. Each dawn inflicts 2 hearts of magical damage as divine favor withdraws. The gods punish those who stray from their path.
tarot.the_hierophant.reversed.title: The Hierophant - Reversed
tarot.the_hierophant.upright.text: Divine protection shields the faithful. Two absorption hearts manifest each dawn for 10 minutes, and sleeping fully restores your health. Sacred blessings guard you.
tarot.the_hierophant.upright.title: The Hierophant - Upright
tarot.the_high_priestess.reversed.text: Secrets remain hidden. Constant darkness clouds your vision, and mining occasionally drains experience (15% chance). The mysteries turn away from your gaze.
tarot.the_high_priestess.reversed.title: The High Priestess - Reversed
tarot.the_high_priestess.upright.text: The veil lifts, revealing hidden truths. Perpetual night vision clarifies the darkness, and breaking blocks has a 5% chance to reveal nearby ores within 8 blocks through glowing particles and highlighting.
tarot.the_high_priestess.upright.title: The High Priestess - Upright
tarot.the_lovers.reversed.text: Love corrupts into violence. Passive animals within 16 blocks turn hostile with 10% chance per second, attacking you and each other. Harmony shatters into bloody chaos.
tarot.the_lovers.reversed.title: The Lovers - Reversed
tarot.the_lovers.upright.text: Creatures are calmed by your harmonious presence. Passive animals within 8 blocks never panic, their fear dissolved by your peaceful aura.
tarot.the_lovers.upright.title: The Lovers - Upright
tarot.the_magician.reversed.text: Magic turns against you. Nearby altars lose 500 power each dawn as your control falters and power scatters to the winds.
tarot.the_magician.reversed.title: The Magician - Reversed
tarot.the_magician.upright.text: Your magical prowess peaks. Nearby altars gain 1,000 power each dawn, and thrown brews have a 20% chance to return to your inventory, their magic preserved for reuse.
tarot.the_magician.upright.title: The Magician - Upright
tarot.the_moon.reversed.text: Harsh daylight overwhelms your senses. During daytime, 5% chance every 5 seconds to suffer 5 seconds of Blindness as clarity obscures truth.
tarot.the_moon.reversed.title: The Moon - Reversed
tarot.the_moon.upright.text: Embrace the shadows completely. Perpetual night vision pierces darkness. Each nightfall grants 10 minutes of Speed II. At night, hostile mobs lose track of you (30% chance every 4 seconds). The moon blesses its children.
tarot.the_moon.upright.title: The Moon - Upright
tarot.the_star.reversed.text: Hope fades to despair. Constant hunger drains 0.5 exhaustion every 5 seconds as your guiding light dims. Stars fall from heaven.
tarot.the_star.reversed.title: The Star - Reversed
tarot.the_star.upright.text: Hope illuminates the darkness. At night under open sky, you slowly regenerate 0.5 hearts every 2 seconds. Each nightfall fully restores health and purges negative effects. Stars guide the faithful.
tarot.the_star.upright.title: The Star - Upright
tarot.the_sun.reversed.text: The sun scorches mercilessly. Under open sky during daytime, you accumulate sun exposure that deals 2 hearts of damage per second when the meter fills. Like vampires, you burn in sunlight. Shadows become sanctuary.
tarot.the_sun.reversed.title: The Sun - Reversed
tarot.the_sun.upright.text: Radiant energy fills you completely. Each dawn brings full restoration of health, hunger, and saturation, plus Regeneration II and Strength for 1 minute. Daylight provides passive healing (0.5 hearts every 3 seconds). The sun's blessing is absolute.
tarot.the_sun.upright.title: The Sun - Upright
tarot.the_tower.reversed.text: Fear of change paralyzes completely. Upheaval never comes, but neither does growth. Stagnation festers in stillness (not yet implemented).
tarot.the_tower.reversed.title: The Tower - Reversed
tarot.the_tower.upright.text: Chaos incarnate awaits. Breaking blocks has 5% chance to trigger small explosions. Rarely (0.1% per tick), Baba Yaga manifests without warning. Catastrophic revelation strikes. This card expires upon summoning.
tarot.the_tower.upright.title: The Tower - Upright
tarot.the_world.reversed.text: Scattered and incomplete. Every 30 seconds, a random debuff (Slowness, Mining Fatigue, Weakness, or Unluck) afflicts you for 10 seconds as harmony fractures. Wholeness eludes your grasp.
tarot.the_world.reversed.title: The World - Reversed
tarot.the_world.upright.text: Everything exists in perfect harmony. Permanent Speed, Haste, Luck, and Regeneration flow through you. Each dawn brings 10 experience levels. Breaking blocks has 10% chance for bonus drops. Perfection achieved.
tarot.the_world.upright.title: The World - Upright
tarot.wheel_of_fortune.reversed.text: Misfortune follows relentlessly. Permanent Unluck II decreases loot quality and success rates. The wheel turns mercilessly against you.
tarot.wheel_of_fortune.reversed.title: Wheel of Fortune - Reversed
tarot.wheel_of_fortune.upright.text: Fortune smiles brilliantly. Permanent Luck II increases loot quality. Kills have 10% chance to drop rare treasures (iron, emerald, gold, mutandis, or experience bottles) and 25% chance to double the mob's entire loot table.
tarot.wheel_of_fortune.upright.title: Wheel of Fortune - Upright
tarot.witchery.death.description: Endings bring new beginnings - fallen foes may rise as ethereal servants, ailments fade at dawn
tarot.witchery.death.reversed.descriptio: Decay drains your vitality, and Death itself stalks you at dusk
tarot.witchery.judgement.description: A second chance when death looms - rise reborn from mortal wounds, heal from victory
tarot.witchery.judgement.reversed.descri: Each kill weighs on your soul, damaging you in turn
tarot.witchery.justice.description: An eye for an eye - those who harm you suffer thorns damage in return
tarot.witchery.justice.reversed.descript: Unfair punishment - you take more damage from all sources
tarot.witchery.strength.description: Enhanced might flows through you - strike harder and heal from each kill
tarot.witchery.strength.reversed.descrip: Your muscles betray you, constant weakness afflicts your blows
tarot.witchery.temperance.description: Harmony restored - slow regeneration when wounded, water breathing, enhanced potions
tarot.witchery.temperance.reversed.descr: Excess and imbalance plague your actions
tarot.witchery.the_chariot.description: Accelerated movement - you move with enhanced speed and agility
tarot.witchery.the_chariot.reversed.desc: Your movement is hindered, as if pulling a great weight
tarot.witchery.the_devil.description: Devastating strength at the cost of your vitality - reduced max health for increased damage
tarot.witchery.the_devil.reversed.descri: Slowly break free from curses and debuffs, but lose experience in the process
tarot.witchery.the_emperor.description: Command the battlefield - gain damage resistance at dawn, your strikes slow enemies
tarot.witchery.the_emperor.reversed.desc: Your authority crumbles - lose experience each dawn
tarot.witchery.the_empress.description: Nature's bounty - bonus crop drops, awaken each morning well-fed
tarot.witchery.the_empress.reversed.desc: Barren harvest - crops may fail when broken
tarot.witchery.the_fool.description: Naive luck protects you - reduced damage taken, random beneficial effects
tarot.witchery.the_fool.reversed.descrip: Clumsy mishaps and increased damage plague your journey
tarot.witchery.the_hanged_man.descriptio: Suffering empowers nearby altars - falling is slower, pain fuels magic
tarot.witchery.the_hanged_man.reversed.d: Unable to release items from your grasp
tarot.witchery.the_hermit.description: Solitude breeds wisdom - gain experience when far from others
tarot.witchery.the_hermit.reversed.descr: Isolation saps your vitality - lose max health when alone
tarot.witchery.the_hierophant.descriptio: Blessed each dawn with absorption, sleeping fully restores your health
tarot.witchery.the_hierophant.reversed.d: Divine grace withheld - take damage each morning
tarot.witchery.the_high_priestess.descri: Perpetual night vision reveals hidden ores when mining - secrets glow briefly
tarot.witchery.the_high_priestess.revers: Intuition blocked - lose experience when mining
tarot.witchery.the_lovers.description: Animals are calmed by your presence, panic fades in your aura
tarot.witchery.the_lovers.reversed.descr: Love twisted - peaceful creatures turn violent against you and each other
tarot.witchery.the_magician.description: Master of the craft - altars recharge each morning, brews may return to you
tarot.witchery.the_magician.reversed.des: Magic backfires - nearby altars drain power each dawn
tarot.witchery.the_moon.description: Night vision, speed at dusk, enemies lose track of you in darkness
tarot.witchery.the_moon.reversed.descrip: Harsh daylight occasionally blinds you - clarity obscures truth
tarot.witchery.the_star.description: Slow regeneration under stars, fully restored when night falls
tarot.witchery.the_star.reversed.descrip: Your guiding light fades - constant hunger drains your energy
tarot.witchery.the_sun.description: Full restoration each dawn, slow healing in daylight, strength and regeneration
tarot.witchery.the_sun.reversed.descript: Scorching rays - daylight burns you beneath open sky
tarot.witchery.the_tower.description: Chaos incarnate - blocks may explode when broken, Baba Yaga may appear
tarot.witchery.the_world.description: Perfect completion - speed, haste, luck, regeneration, bonus drops, experience at dawn
tarot.witchery.the_world.reversed.descri: Discord and incompletion - random debuffs plague you
tarot.witchery.wheel_of_fortune.descript: Fortune's favor - increased luck, rare drops from slain enemies
tarot.witchery.wheel_of_fortune.reversed: The wheel turns against you - constant bad luck
vampirism.armor.page.1:
\
Increased comfort will make all the difference. Use Bone Needle to stain wool
vampirism.cane.page.1: Can collect blood with each hit, stored in the cane to be drunk whenever.
vampirism.sun_collector.page.1: Place in the sun and put a Quartz Sphere on it to collect the sunlight
vampirism.vamp_1.page.1:
\
\
It is with some reluctance I commit these observations to paper, for what I have witnessed is not for the weak of mind. Instead, take my words as a warning.
vampirism.vamp_1.page.2:
\
\
...he was reminiscing over dinner this evening about his "birth", a demonic pact of sorts...
\
\
\
\
 ..butchering a chicken over a skull with an Arthana and holding a glass goblet to collect the blood is barbaric," I told him...
vampirism.vamp_1.page.3:
\
\
...apparently start of a long forgotten rite 
\
\
\
\
\
 ..night, open to the moon, chalk, candles and skull
vampirism.vamp_1.page.4:
\
\
\
\
...pouring the blood onto the skull... 
\
\
\
\
 ..mumbling about taking her to the underworld
vampirism.vamp_1.page.5:
\
\
...proving his worth to her... 
\
\
\
\
\
\
\
\
\
 ..that glass goblet again, could someone really drink such a thing? ...
vampirism.vamp_2.page.1:
\
\
...Today, or should I say this evening, he told me about his first kill...
\
\
\
\
 ...the thirst that first night, he said, was overwhelming, he had to fully sait hes hunger...
vampirism.vamp_3.page.1:
\
...he found he was able to transfix his victims...
\
\
\
... was now able to drink as he needed without others realizing, so long as he did not drain more than half...\
\
\
\
\
 ...did so, from five oblivious souls...
vampirism.vamp_4.page.1:
\
...strength was flowing into him, the more he drank, as the nights progressed, the stronger he became...
\
\
\
\
 ...it was on the forth night after his mastery of drinking that the world slowed down...
vampirism.vamp_5.page.1:
\
...his greatest foe, the sun, was ever present, tormenting and instantly deadly to him...
\
\
\
\
\
 ...became his obsession... ...found a way to collect sunlight and burnt himself with it ten times during the night...
vampirism.vamp_6.page.1:
\
\
...first walk in the sun after his rebirth brought him to bloody tears, he felt his blood burning, but no longer instantly...
\
\
\
\
 ...he needed more strength, and extinguishing creatures of pure fire was his solution... ...twenty died.
vampirism.vamp_7.page.1:
\
...he could smash solid stone, but bound to the earth, however fast, he was still limited...
\
\
 ...he called in Her once more, repeating the rite of his rebirth...\
\
 ...gifted Her a flower, the color of the blood She so craves...
vampirism.vamp_8.page.1:
\
\
...he smiled, a rare event, when he told me of his first flight...
\
\
\
\
\
 ...he flew from village to village, until he knew the full extent of his domain, there was now nowhere he could not go...
vampirism.vamp_9.page.1:
\
...the weak minded would now not only let him drink his fill, but would also follow like faithful hounds...
\
\
\
 ...horror of all horrors, he lured five of them to specially prepared iron cages, topped with wood and with a gap at the front. He sealed them inside...
vampirism.vamp_9.page.2:
\
\
\
...he began feeding from each of them; mesmerising them first, then carefully he drank al he could without damaging any...\
vampirism.vamp_9.page.3: At last he knew his blood was strong enough to replicate what She had done for him... ...left me weak, close to oblivion but I watched him fill a glass goblet and hand it to me... ...we both sat next to a coffin, far from the sun's gaze, "drink" is all he said...
witchery.add_page.1: Added the first page to the key
witchery.add_page.2: Added the second page to the key
witchery.add_page.3: Added the third page to the key
witchery.add_page.4: Added the forth page to the key
witchery.add_page.5: Added the fifth page to the key
witchery.add_page.6: Added the sixth page to the key
witchery.add_page.7: Added the seventh page to the key
witchery.add_page.8: Added the eight page to the key
witchery.add_page.9: Added the final page to the key
witchery.coven.added_player: %s has been added to your coven
witchery.coven.already_member: This player is already a member of your coven
witchery.coven.bound_members: Successfully bound %s members to your coven
witchery.coven.contract_destroyed: The coven contract has been destroyed! Your coven has been disbanded.
witchery.coven.contract_signed: You have signed the Coven Contract
witchery.coven.disbanded: You have been removed from the coven
witchery.coven.needs_demon_heart: This witch needs a Demon Heart to join your coven
witchery.coven.no_witches: You have no witches in your coven to summon
witchery.coven.not_member: This player is not a member of your coven
witchery.coven.player_limit: Your coven has reached the maximum number of players
witchery.coven.summoned: Summoned %s witches to the ritual circle
witchery.coven.witch_added: Witch has been bound to your coven
witchery.coven.witch_already_bound: This witch is already bound to a coven
witchery.coven.witch_died: One of your coven witches has died
witchery.coven.witch_limit: Your coven has reached the maximum number of witches
witchery.curse.befuddlement.name: the Curse of Befuddlement
witchery.curse.corrupt_poppet.name: the Curse of Corrupt Poppet
witchery.curse.fragility.name: the Curse of Fragility
witchery.curse.hunger.name: the Curse of Hunger
witchery.curse.insanity.name: the Curse of Insanity
witchery.curse.misfortune.name: the Curse of Misfortune
witchery.curse.overheating.name: the Curse of Overheating
witchery.curse.sinking.name: the Curse of Sinking
witchery.hags_ring.lumber.desc: Use with Witches Hand to vein mine logs
witchery.hags_ring.miner.desc: Use with Witches Hand to vein mine ores
witchery.ritual.curses_disabled: This ritual cannot be performed - curses are disabled
witchery.use_with_needle: Use with Bone Needle to fill
witchery:ritual/apply_ointment.tooltip: When imbued into broom-wood, the charm awakens. The air no longer resists, and the winds know thy name
witchery:ritual/bind_familiar.tooltip: Binds a familiar to the Player. A Familiar might aid in certain prospects of a witches life.
Binds spectral being to Effigies. Multiple binds might yield unusual effects.
witchery:ritual/blocks_below_copper.tool: Pulls the blocks below to the surface
witchery:ritual/blocks_below_gold.toolti: Pulls the blocks below to the surface
witchery:ritual/blocks_below_iron.toolti: Pulls the blocks below to the surface
witchery:ritual/charge_attuned.tooltip: Charges an Attuned Stone with 2000 Altar Power
Curses the poppets of the player
witchery:ritual/curse_of_overheating.too: Too heat sensitive to be in the desert
witchery:ritual/infuse_light.tooltip: Infuses the player with the Ghost of the Light
witchery:ritual/infuse_necromancy.toolti: Infuse the player with Necromantic Soulbind
witchery:ritual/infuse_otherwhere.toolti: Infuses the player with the Spirit of Otherwhere
witchery:ritual/manifestation.tooltip: Allows you to pass through spirit portals
witchery:ritual/necro_stone.tooltip: A stone as cold as the grave and thrice as silent. It is not carved, but called—formed beneath moon-lit skies where the veil is thin. Death clings to it like moss to tombstone.
witchery:ritual/pull_mobs.tooltip: The ritual circle will contain mobs
witchery:ritual/push_mobs.tooltip: Pushes hostile mobs away from ritual center
witchery:ritual/resurrect_familiar.toolt: A bound familiar will be revived
witchery:ritual/rite_of_charging_infusio: Charges the power of an Infused player
witchery:ritual/soul_severance.tooltip: Will Split you from your flesh, not advised
witchery:ritual/soulbind.tooltip: Fuses a players soul form into flesh again
witchery:ritual/stone_ritual.tooltip: Will turn you and others into stone
witchery:ritual/summon_demon.tooltip: Summon a Demon at ritual center
witchery:ritual/summon_imp.tooltip: Summon an Imp at ritual center
witchery:ritual/summon_lightning.tooltip: Summons a Lightning Strike at ritual center
witchery:ritual/summon_lightning_on_ways: Summons a Lightning Strike at bound Waystone location
witchery:ritual/summon_spectral_pig.tool: Summon an Spectral Pig at ritual center
witchery:ritual/summon_witch.tooltip: Summon a Witch at ritual center
witchery:ritual/summon_wither.tooltip: Summon a Wither at ritual center
witchery:ritual/teleport_owner_to_waysto: Teleports the user to bound Waystone location
witchery:ritual/teleport_taglock_to_ways: Teleports the bound Taglock entity to bound Waystone location
